extendedInfo.description: Chamberlain College of Nursing students can now access their grades, class schedule, important phone numbers, and more through the new Chamberlain App.-----------------------------Features- Participate in your discussion threads for your nursing and general education courses- Read news from the Chamberlain Blog- View your class schedule, grades, and academic calendar- Access important phone numbers for Academic Advising, Online Classes Tech Support, or the Help Desk- Access the Chamberlain Library- Complete a feedback survey and let us know what you think!-------------------------------------------Signing Into the app---------------The Home sign in screen requires you to use your Student Portal login user name and password. The Nursing Courses and the Gen Ed Courses sign in requires you to use your eCollege login user name and password.  ---------------------------------------------------------We look forward to the continued progress and improvement of this App for your student experience.  Your feedback is needed and it is greatly appreciated, keep it coming!Sincerely,Chamberlain Mobile Support

reviews.title: Won\'t open my course
reviews.comment: When I try to open my course this app redirects me to DeVry and says I do not have any courses. The help link directs me to the schools website and they don\'t know anything about the app. Would love to access on my phone, but can\'t!
reviews.author: Cynthia Moir

reviews.comment: Was unable to log on! Disappointed
reviews.author: brandi molden

reviews.title: Won\'t open courses
reviews.comment: All the other links work but trying to open courses it just says loading forever. It won\'t open or do anything. I just give up waiting. Please fix this. Mostly what people want to use this app for...
reviews.author: Kristin Doyle

reviews.title: Exciting
reviews.comment: Looking forward to seeing the potential of this app.
reviews.author: Alex Thomas
